title: BitcoinPenny
author: BitcoinPenny
content: Introducing the 2024 Bitcoin Penny® 10th Anniversary Mega Coin!In a few short months, The Bitcoin Penny Company will proudly announce its 10TH ANNIVERSARY in this blessed and amazing industry, and we’re celebrating by creating a very special Bitcoin Penny® 10th Anniversary Mega Coin! Each of these 10th Anniversary Mega Coins will be made of a whopping ONE KILO of the finest (.999+) investment grade silver or gold bullion. (That’s right! ONE KILO of pure silver or gold!)Only ten (10) of these SILVER 10th Anniversary Mega Coins will ever be made, along with only one (1) GOLD 10th Anniversary Mega Coin. These very special 10th Anniversary Mega Coins will be sold via auction, so that all members of the crypto-community may have an equal and fair opportunity to claim one of these monster collectibles!THE PRIZESBitcoin Penny® SILVER 10th Anniversary Mega CoinsMetal: .999 Fine SilverQuantity: 10Weight: 1.00 KilogramSize: 4” Diameter x .5” ThickSerial Numbers: Yes, each coin will feature a unique serial number (1-10).Accessory: Heirloom Quality, Solid Walnut Box (Handcrafted w/ Silver Satin Lining)Opening Bid: .05 BTC (Production Cost Only)Bid Increments: .005 BTCBitcoin Penny® GOLD 10th Anniversary Mega CoinMetal: .999 Fine GoldQuantity: 1/1Weight: 1.00 KilogramSize: 4” Diameter x .25” ThickSerial Number: Yes, this coin will feature the “1/1” serial number.Accessory: Heirloom Quality, Solid Walnut Box (Handcrafted w/ Gold Satin Lining)Opening Bid: 2.2 BTC (Production Cost Only)Bid Increments: .005 BTCNOTE: This extra special 1/1 GOLD Mega Coin is starting at manufacturing cost only. Zero profits on this extra special prize. We simply wish to see one made, and we’ll do it at cost! (In fact, the opening bid is just over spot price, so when gold prices go back up, this piece may easily be worth more than what it cost to make today!)AUCTION RULESStart Time: ImmediatelyEnd Time: Sunday, July 16th, 2023 @ 7PM EST (UTC -4:00).*CLICK HERE FOR LIVE COUNTDOWN TIMER*Anti-Sniping Rule / Grace Period: There will be a grace period of ten (10) minutes following the last bid. When ten (10) minutes pass without a new bid, the auction will be officially ended. For example, if someone places a bid on Sunday, July 16th at 6:55 PM, then the auction will extend until 7:05 PM. If another bid is placed at 7:03 PM, then the auction extends until 7:13 PM, and so forth.This is a multi-auction. Each of these very special 10th Anniversary silver or gold coins will be auctioned SEPARATELY. In other words, you are bidding on one (1) silver or gold coin per bid. If you wish to bid on more than one (1) coin, then please place your multiple bids in the following (or similar) format:Quote from: YOU1 Silver @ .13 BTC2 Silver @ .125 BTC (This equals a total of .25 BTC.)1 Gold @ 2.23 BTC…so forth and so on…PAYMENTSWinning bids must be paid within 72 hours of auction’s end. We happily accept Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE), and Ethereum (ETH). PayPal and/or other cryptocurrencies may be accepted on an individual member basis upon request. PM to inquire. Please make all BTC payments to the following addresses only: 1TBPCoEc2MYiQtjT4xduZjAqCBjPhTNDh or 3MJZ18DfLWBMF5hFjFLQS6DCLgyeLPg3Tx.SHIPPINGFREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING.OUR STANDARD “RETURNS & REFUNDS” POLICYOur customers are welcome to return any of our fine products within 10 business days due to manufacturing defects only. All refunds will be issued to the customer as either store credit to be redeemed for future purchases or as a cash refund issued in the same amount and form of currency as originally paid by the customer. The Bitcoin Penny Company abides by the decade-old mantra of bitcoin enthusiasts around the world: “BITCOIN IS BITCOIN. FIAT IS FIAT.”DOODLESYes, you'll receive one free "10th Anniversary” Bitcoin Penny® doodle with your purchase!ETC.For more information, simply PM.Regards,Chris @ The Bitcoin Penny Co.In Code We Trust® / E-Currency Unum®DISCLAIMER: Bitcoin Penny® Commemorative Coins are for entertainment purposes only. No cash value.

I do realize that this was a “pre-order” auction, but still, 6 months with ZEOR update is unacceptable. I have REALLY tried to give BCP the benefit of the doubt here, but feels dirty. The cost was higher as well - I opted for and received my .05 back when he presented the offer to me.here it is:Quote from: BitcoinPenny on November 13, 2023, 08:32:19 PMQuote from: tldr-hodl on November 13, 2023, 08:24:41 PMWait what?? I can wait, but nobody told me it's been cancelled altogether?! And I've paid for mine...Don't worry. We've had to put few projects on hold until the start of the year, and this is one of them. We considered the possibility of issuing refunds to the 4 customers (and we still can, if one wished) and canceling the project, since it runs similar to another project that has been in the works for well over a year and is almost ready to reveal (finally!), but we decided to continue the project and just release at the start of our 10th year. But Mopar is right, we had considered canceling the project at one point recently. However, we decided against it.Thanks again, everyone.Regards,Chris@TBPCo.and as I read it, he is actually saying it was not cancelled... He told me it was and that I could get a refund or have it credited towards the silver MHC. I think I would have to pay .065 additional - with all the delays, I was not wanting to send more funds so I got the refund.So, I was wrong and it appears this project was not scrapped. I did get a refund - I do not know about the 3 other winners.
